system.notes: Must mount on Prow or Keel. Can fire 6 torpedos per salvo, can store 42 (+6 in tubes). If component is damaged/destroyed but not unpowered/depressurised while torpedos are loaded, roll 1d10, on a 0, component explodes, destroying it and doing 2d5 Hull Damage. +2VU speed to torpedo on turn launched.
